name: Hotel Berdichevsky

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I stayed there for 3 nights with my girl friend and it was just perfect!!
reviews.title: Amazing experience!!!
Best Choice in Tel Aviv
reviews.text: The room was very clean, cozy and spacious, the location is amazing just 1 min from Rothschild st and 10 min walking from neve tzedek.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hotel stuff are pleasant and professional
reviews.title: Almost all you need to clean your head

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We would definitely recommend this hotel and would stay there again.
reviews.title: Below Expectations

reviews.text: It is the first time I stayed in a boutique hotel in Tel Aviv rather than in the traditional 5 star . For sure I will always try to come back to Hotel Berdichevsky in all my future visits.
reviews.title: Polished Gem

reviews.text: The personal is wery good, rooms was very clean, comfortable and always cleaned, the restaurant was very good. Close to everything: cafe, nightlife, shopping, concerts. I'm really enjoyed to stay in this hotel and next time I'll stay just in this hotel when I'll come to israel.
reviews.title: Amazing hotel!!!!

reviews.text: Very nice hotel, really clean. Rooms luxuriously decorated. The staff was very polite and friendly. About 15 mins walk to the beach and about a minute to get to the Habima theatre (lots of cafés near the hotel).
reviews.title: Awesome Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is new so perhaps not well known. My advice is beat the rush and stay at this wonderful hotel. The location is perfect for everything you may want to do. Staff is very friendly and helpful as well as professional. It is a blend of bed and breakfast and luxury hotel. We highly recommend it
reviews.title: truly wonderful

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We went there for a romantic getaway and enjoyed ourselves very much.
reviews.title: Great Hotel B

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The location is fantastic for all purposes- in a small and quiet street but close to the coltural center of Tel-Aviv. The breakfast was phenomenal and the staff was very nice and welcoming. The rooms are very comfortable and clean. Alltogether it was a great experience.
reviews.title: What a Treat!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We left the kids with their grandparents and checked into "Hotel B" for a short weekend getaway.
reviews.title: A hidden gem!

reviews.text: Loved it, loved it, loved it!
reviews.title: A plesant experience

reviews.text: I can't say how much I loved this hotel.
reviews.title: PERFECT. Stay here.

reviews.text: Hotel: lovely small boutique hotel. The lobby is a small restaurant / bar beautifully done. Even the lift has been wallpapered.
reviews.title: the best ever !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

reviews.text: Rooms: WOW. Gorgeous. In fact maybe the nicest hotel room I have ever stayed in. The whole room is tiled in marble. Great decor. Beautiful bathroom with bling walk-in shower. If I was not in such a great city I would not have left.
reviews.title: Hotel Berdichevsky

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Staff. WOW x1000000. Everyone who worked there is friendly, helpful, welcoming. Nothing was too much trouble. Just perfect. Special mention to for Nessy and the barman / waiter in the evening whose name I do not know.
reviews.title: We stayed at better ones...

reviews.text: Food: again, wonderful. Breakfast is served from a menu and was great. We had one dinner which was also great.
reviews.title: Great small property - fantastic stay

description: Hotel B Berdicevsky is a brand new 23 room boutique hotel, ideally located steps from Rothschild Boulevard on a quiet street in the heart of Tel Aviv's cultural center. Catering to the lifestyle-driven traveler, we offer a unique Tel Aviv boutique experience for those who seek the luxury and service of a large hotel chain, with the charm and customized service of a small boutique hotel. Our attention to detail extends from round-the-clock professional and personalized service, to our intimately sized, yet comfortable and lavishly appointed rooms.We invite you to be our guest. Experience our lifestyle.
